actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 3402 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that proceeds from identical wagers will not be aggregated for purposes of determining whether tax should be withheld.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that proceeds from identical wagers will not be aggregated for purposes of determining whether the excise tax on wagering should be withheld.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3402 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that proceeds from identical wagers will not be aggregated for purposes of determining whether tax should be withheld.
